document.full_text: pushing her opponent from sideline to sideline paid off for francesca schiavone of italy, the defending french open champion, who reached the fourth round friday when her opponent, shuai peng of china, was forced to withdraw with a leg injury.
document.title: schiavone advances after peng retires
lines_and_colors: pushing her opponent from sideline to sideline paid off for francesca schiavone of italy, the defending french open champion, who reached the fourth round friday when her opponent, shuai peng of china, was forced to withdraw with a leg injury.
